name: App Conex
description: Conex is an Android application showcasing mobile development skills. It integrates key features such as Bluetooth connectivity, camera access, geolocation services, and messaging capabilities, alongside a comprehensive notification system. This project demonstrates the ability to create complete and functional mobile apps, highlighting experience in developing user-friendly interfaces and robust backend integrations.

name: Profesores Extranjeros - Web Application for Time Tracking
description: Developed a web application for time tracking as a freelancer for a Colombian company, Profesores Extranjeros. This project involved full-stack development, including design and testing. Featuring administrative and professor roles, the application has streamlined the company's tracking of worked hours and automated monthly payroll processing, significantly improving operational efficiency and accuracy.

name: Own Business Webelopers
description: Co-founded Webelopers, a web and mobile development company, with three partners. We deliver cutting-edge technology solutions to optimize processes and drive growth in the digital era. Our projects range from websites to mobile applications, utilizing technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB, Firebase, and Spring Boot. As a technology partner, we empower organizations to thrive through innovative solutions.

name: RoboCup Code of Participation
description: Participated as a team member of Sabana Herons, representing Universidad de la Sabana at RoboCup 2024 in Eindhoven, Netherlands. Competed in the Standard Platform League (SPL) using NAO robots, contributing to the development and implementation of AI-driven robotic solutions.

slug: Event Driven Architecture with Microservices Kubernetes
name: Event-Driven Architecture with Microservices
description: Developed an event-driven architecture using microservices for scalable applications, leveraging Kubernetes for container orchestration. This system sends email notifications and provides financial advice to assist individuals with bank transactions, demonstrating expertise in designing robust, scalable, and event-driven systems.

name: ChatBot Challenge
description: Won a competition for implementing a chatbot to enhance the student experience by providing information about the university. Our chatbot excelled in recommending tasks, activities, and professors, functioning as a virtual assistant and improving student engagement and access to resources.

name: Resume Generator with Make.com
description: Developed an automation to generate resumes based on specific job offers. This application uses AI to recommend the best skills and experiences to highlight, integrating with Google Drive to generate a PDF file. Showcases skills in AI-driven automation and document generation.
